titleStmt.title: Íslenska risamálheildin - útgefnar bækur [IGC-Books]
The Icelandic Gigaword Corpus - published books [IGC-Books]
Útgefnar bækur, 1968 - 2021
Published books, 1968 - 2021

respStmt.resp: Collection and processing of texts. TEI encoding.

publisher.orgName: Stofnun Árna Magnússonar í íslenskum fræðum
Árni Magnússon Institute for Icelandic Studies

availability.p: Þessi texti er gefinn út með IGC - restricted licence.
This work is licensed under the IGC - restricted licence.

projectDesc.p: IGC-Books is a part of the IGC-Project (Icelandic Gigaword corpus)that aims to collect as much as possible of Icelandic texts that can be published, under an open or restricted licence. IGC-Books contains texts from books that have been published in Iceland. The corpus is published in two versions. IGC-Books contains plain text while IGC-Book.ana is linguistically marked-up versions.

editorialDecl.p: Textum hefur verið skipt upp í hluta sem innhalda 500 orð eða færri og svo raðað upp á nýtt. Efnisgreinar eru ekki slitnar í sundur nema þær innihaldi meira en 500 orð. Ef texti inniheldur færri en 5000 orð þá eru setningar innan hverrar efnisgreinar einnig stokkaðar upp. Í sumum tilvikum hafa textabrot verið fjarlægð úr texta - t.d. ef ekki höfundur brots hafði ekki veitt leyfi eða ef texti var á erlendu máli.

The texts have been split into parts that do not include more than 500 words and reordered in a random way. Paragraphs are not dismantled unless they contain more than 500 words. If a text contains less than 5000 words, sentences of each paragraph are also rearranged. In some instances, we have removed fragments from texts, for example, if we did not have permission from the author of that fragment or if the fragment was not in Icelandic.

application.label: Tokenizer
application.desc: Tokenisation and sentence segmentation with Tokeniser from Miðeind, available from https://github.com/mideind/Tokenizer.

application.label: ABLTagger (PoS)
application.desc: Part-of-speech tagging with ABLTagger (PoS), available from http://hdl.handle.net/20.500.12537/115.

application.label: Nefnir
application.desc: Lemmatisation with Nefnir available at https://github.com/jonfd/nefnir

listPerson.head: Listi yfir höfunda, þýðendur og ritstjóra
List of authors, translators and editors
